notes.text: We’ve added additional export settings for columns
We now provide an experimental API to support the collaborative draft in reuse components
You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
You can now preserve the exact decimal places returned from the back end for currency values
We now reduce the number of requests when discarding a draft
We’ve resolved an issue where side effects didn’t trigger any messages related to changes made on the subobject page
We now correctly handle errors that occur when creating content in building blocks at runtime
